overview.name: Audio Ads
overview.description: At the beginning of 2021, Spotify rolled out Podcast Ads in Germany and the U.K. These audio ads, will allow brands access to popular German and UK podcast titles.

overview.name: Audio Ads
overview.description: At the beginning of 2021, Spotify rolled out Podcast Ads in Germany and the U.K. These audio ads, will allow brands access to popular German and UK podcast titles.

overview.name: Ad Campaign
overview.description: This campaign promotes five ad films and was launched by Spotify India to spread more awareness to podcasts, and the roles they can have in people's lives. This campaign was also launched because podcasts have become increasingly popular in India. India has an increasingly popular market for Anchor which is a tool Spotify uses for the creation and distribution of podcasts.

overview.name: Ad Campaign
overview.description: Spotify "Wrapped" is a campaign that showed users the statistics of what they listened to in the year. This campaign went live in 21 markets, specifically North America, Latin America, Asia, Australia, and Japan.

overview.name: Partnerships
overview.description: Spotify has partnerships worldwide. In the U.S and U.K a relevant partnership is with Xbox, where Xbox "Game Pass Ultimate Members" recieve a free six month trial of Spotify Premium. In France a free six month trial of Spotify Premium is offered to customers on Bouygues Telecom broadband and eligible mobile plans. In Brazil, Magalu Conecta customers are offered a free four month trial of Spotify Premium. In Australia, Vodafone customers are offered a free 30-day trial of Spotify Premium when Spotify Premium is added to their existing mobile plan.

overview.name: Partnerships
overview.description: Estonain Company, Fortumo, has partnered with Spotify for the expanion of a carrier billing program. This expansion is specfically for Spotify users in Indonesia and Thailand.

overview.name: Partnerships
overview.description: Spotify partnered with Starbucks to create what they called a "music ecosystem". Spotify created Starbucks-curated playlists which were also available in the Starbucks app. This partnership and its features were rolled out in the U.S, Canada, and the U.K in the fall of 2015.

overview.name: Reach
overview.description: This shows how many people in the Netherlands between July 2017 to August 2020 were exposed to the brand Spotify through desktop,tablet, and smartphone.

overview.name: Aquistions
overview.description: In 2017, Spotify bought French AI startup Niland.

overview.name: Social Media Marketing
overview.description: Spotify made it in the top 10 leading mobile advertisers on Facebook in Canada for 2020. Spotify had 553.86 million impressions, and spent 2.3 million dollars.

overview.name: Algorithmic recommendations
overview.description: This study analyzed how Spotify's algorithmic recommendations were used specifically in Costa Rica. This study was done because Spotify put a heavy focus on Costa Rica because of their growth in Latin America.
